name: Petals Redux (2014)
description:
Petals Redux is a puzzle game in which you have to find triplets of flowers that fulfill the following criteria: Each flower has 4 properties, the color of petals, the number of petals, the shape of the petals and the color of the core. The triplet chosen has to be so that each property is either different (no two are the same) or the same (all three are the same).

Project webpage: https://thp.io/2014/petals/
